Hey Airly,

(I am sending this one back through the group again)

I have noticed that you are getting more frequent with your posting.
Does this mean that you are ready to once again take on running
Hydras? And have you been able to catch up on what's going on?

If you are ready, and only if you are ready, as I am not tying to push
you, I can unpause the other threads and continue. Since you are
playing a faction leader I have to be sure you are ready.

If required I can run them slow so you can keep up with them.

let me know what's up. I am flexible :)

- Preston
